title: Kataragama PS Chairman & Deputy brawl
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); An altercation broke out between the Chairman and the Deputy Chairman of the Kataragama Pradeshiya Sabha on Wednesday (20).
The Police said that the altercation had taken place due to an argument.
Both sustained injuries and they are currently being treated at the Kataragama and Debarawewa hospitals.
